column2:
"...…what we have just witnessed is
the truth from 10 years ago. "

"The defeat of [The Apprentice]. The attack of [Persona]. Having gone through this, she nearly unleashed all the darkness
that she had ingested...…"
"Thus she attempted to eliminate herself, with her own hands, to stop this...…"

"And Xion's thoughts we heard
while we were returning...…"

"The reason why all the memories were erased
from 10 years ago was, more so than preventing us discover
her...…Xion herself
wanted to forget. "

"Furthermore, the fact that Matoi arrived in our
time ten years later...…is probably our fault."

"She was mixed up in our return
journey, and ended up there...…
having lost her memory and power. "

"It was probably because of this that Clarissa had shattered to pieces
and scattered all over the place
...…the places within her memory."

"...…<%me>.
I am going to talk about my
objective opinion. I want you to
listen without getting angry."

"The response she was giving 10 years ago...…the amount of darkness
she was spewing from her body was different than anything we have ever seen."

"
It's no comparison to Dark Falz.
So ominous, it's almost overwhelming.
It's a darkness that reaches the depths of the abyss. "

"While having the possibility of
becoming this and yet she
hasn't at this point......"

"It's not a bad course of action to
kill her now while you can. "

"<%me>?
And Xiao?
What's happening, you look so scary."
"Yeah?"

"No, it's nothing.
It's nothing, Matoi.
Are you physically well now?"

"Yeah, I've got Filia's stamp of approval.
So <%me>. "
"It's been a while - let's talk? "

"I want to here many more
stories from you. "

"……今、見てきたのが
十年前の真実。"

"【若人】の撃退。【仮面】の襲撃。
それを経た上で、彼女は、今まで
喰らってきた闇を解き放ちかけた……"

"それを止めるために、自らの手で
自らを消し去ろうとした……か。"

"それと、帰還中に聞こえてきた
シオンの想い……"

"十年前の記録が全て消されていたのは
彼女のことを調べさせない以上に
……シオンが忘れたかったんだ。"

"そして、マトイが十年後……
今、この時代に来てしまったのは
ぼくたちのせいだろう。"

"ぼくたちの帰還に巻き込まれ
記憶と力を失って、あそこに……"

"あの影響で、クラリッサも砕け散り
各地に散らばったんだろう……
……彼女の記憶にある、各地に。"

"……<%me>。
ぼくはこれから、客観的な話をする。
怒らずに、聞いて欲しい。"

"十年前の彼女が見せた反応……
あの、身体から噴き出していた闇は
これまでのものとは違っていた。"

"ダークファルスすら、比じゃない。
圧倒的なまでの、禍々しさ。
深遠にすら至るほどの、闇だ。"

"彼女がそれになる可能性があって
今、この時点ではまだ
そうなっていないというのなら……"

"今のうちに、彼女を殺しておくのは
決して悪い手段じゃないよ。"

"<%me>？
それに、シャオくん？
どうしたの、そんな怖い顔して。"
"マトイ……"
"うん？"

"いいや、なんでもない。
なんでもないよ、マトイ。
もう身体は大丈夫なのかい？"

"うん、フィリアさんのお墨付き。
だから<%me>"
"久しぶりにいろいろお話ししよう？"

"わたし、もっと、もーっと
いろんな話を聞いてみたいんだ。"
